headline.print_headline: Fox TV Network Chief to Depart After Ratings Slump
headline.main: Fox TV Network Chief to Depart After Ratings Slump

docs.snippet: Kevin Reilly, the top executive at Fox broadcast television, is leaving the network next month, the company said on Thursday, after Fox slumped to last place in ratings among the big U.S. broadcasters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kevin Reilly, the top executive at Fox broadcast television, is leaving the network next month, the company said on Thursday, after Fox slumped to last place in ratings among the big U.S. broadcasters.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Slain Woman's Husband Killed 1st Wife
headline.main: Pakistan: Slain Woman's Husband Killed 1st Wife

docs.snippet: The husband of a woman stoned to death in Pakistan killed his first wife four years ago, police and relatives said Thursday, a shocking twist both showing how complicated justice can be and how dangerous life is for women in the country....
docs.lead_paragraph: The husband of a woman stoned to death in Pakistan killed his first wife four years ago, police and relatives said Thursday, a shocking twist both showing how complicated justice can be and how dangerous life is for women in the country.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Charges Five Boston Airline Employees With Smuggling Cash
headline.main: U.S. Charges Five Boston Airline Employees With Smuggling Cash

docs.snippet: Federal prosecutors in Boston on Thursday charged five U.S. airline employees with agreeing to use their security passes to smuggle $417,000 in cash that the employees believed to be the proceeds of illegal drug sales through the city's airport....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in Boston on Thursday charged five U.S. airline employees with agreeing to use their security passes to smuggle $417,000 in cash that the employees believed to be the proceeds of illegal drug sales through the city's airport.

headline.print_headline: Ford Recalls Nearly 200,000 Taurus Sedans in North America
headline.main: Ford Recalls Nearly 200,000 Taurus Sedans in North America

docs.snippet: Ford Motor Co said on Thursday it is recalling nearly 200,000 Taurus sedans in North America from the 2010 to 2014 model years on a corrosion issue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co said on Thursday it is recalling nearly 200,000 Taurus sedans in North America from the 2010 to 2014 model years on a corrosion issue.

headline.print_headline: 8 States Release Action Plan to Promote Clean Cars
headline.main: 8 States Release Action Plan to Promote Clean Cars

docs.snippet: Eight states on the East and West coasts released a plan Thursday for working together to put 3.3 million zero-emission vehicles on the nation's roads by 2025....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eight states on the East and West coasts released a plan Thursday for working together to put 3.3 million zero-emission vehicles on the nation's roads by 2025.

docs.snippet: Ford is recalling 1.4 million SUVs and cars in North America to fix steering, rust and floor mat problems....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ford is recalling 1.4 million SUVs and cars in North America to fix steering, rust and floor mat problems.

headline.main: Surviving at the Poker Tables: Colson Whitehead Talks About 'The Noble Hustle'

docs.snippet: Mr. Whitehead’s new memoir is about his participation in the World Series of Poker....

headline.print_headline: French Open Watch: Jankovic Does Paris Chic
headline.main: French Open Watch: Jankovic Does Paris Chic

docs.snippet: Winning over the chic Parisians can prove quite a challenge in a city renowned for its fashion shows and designer shops....
docs.lead_paragraph: Winning over the chic Parisians can prove quite a challenge in a city renowned for its fashion shows and designer shops.

headline.print_headline: AP Sources: Russian Troops Leaving Ukraine Border
headline.main: AP Sources: Russian Troops Leaving Ukraine Border

docs.snippet: U.S. defense officials said Thursday that Russia has pulled most of its forces away from the Ukraine border, a withdrawal that the U.S. has been demanding for weeks....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. defense officials said Thursday that Russia has pulled most of its forces away from the Ukraine border, a withdrawal that the U.S. has been demanding for weeks.

headline.print_headline: Iran Reports Its First Death From MERS Virus
headline.main: Iran Reports Its First Death From MERS Virus

docs.snippet: Iran has suffered its first fatality from the Middle Eastern respiratory virus, its official news agency reported Thursday, a day after the first cases in Islamic Republic were publicized....
docs.lead_paragraph: Iran has suffered its first fatality from the Middle Eastern respiratory virus, its official news agency reported Thursday, a day after the first cases in Islamic Republic were publicized.
